bibl.title: Resolutions and Chronology in Euripides. The Fragmentary Tragedies. (BICS Supplement. 43.)
bibl.note: L'ouvrage est le fruit de la collaboration entre un philologue classique et un statisticien. En conclusion (pp. 69-92): General survey of results for the fragmentary tragedies. - Detailed summary of findings for each fragmentary tragedy.
Cropp Martin J. and Gordon Fick, Resolutions and Chronology in Euripides. The Fragmentary Tragedies. (BICS Supplement. 43.)
London, Institute for Classical Studies, 1985, 4Â°, xi-92 pp.
